Question
========

From a regular deck of 52 playing cards, half of which are black (13 clubs, 13 spades) and the other half red (13 hearts, 13 diamonds) a card is randomly drawn. P (card is black not a card of spades) =

Answerlist
----------

* 0
* 1/4
* 1/3
* 1/2

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0: Incorrect
* 1/4: Incorrect
* 1/3: Correct
* 1/2: Incorrect
